page.title: 17CovPac
page.content: This is one of the units on the Rowley Drive Industrial Estate. It is a distribution depot for all types of cardboard and paper packaging ranging from heavy duty card to 'bobble' paper and corrugated card. The firm does not manufacture any of its own products but buys in the ready-produced items for resale. This location is in its third site in each case the move being prompted by its ever expanding opera tions.It has a trade area of 50 mile radius around Coventry.It moved into this premises,which it has purchased, in February 1985.It was formerly occupied by two engineering firms which subsequently went out of business.Re-organisation is the first job,splitting up the floor space in order to conserve heat and reduce costs.
